Russian Roulette [Damian]

by Damian Yerrick

Released Jul 4, 2010
Players 1
Tags
License

Download ROM

Description

Here is a home-brew title which simulates a game of Russian Roulette. A zapper can also be used in playing this game. Released By: Damian Yerrick
